choice.title: Ice @ver@
choice.description: Everything needed to develop Ice applications on OS X in all supported programming languages. This installer includes executables, release libraries, header files, Java classes and third-party dependencies. Installed to /Library/Developer/Ice-@ver@.

choice.title: Ice for Python
choice.description: Ice for Python modules for Python 2.7 , installed to /Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/

choice.title: IceGrid Admin
choice.description: IceGrid Admin is a graphical client for IceGrid. IceGrid Admin allows you to monitor servers deployed by IceGrid, create new IceGrid applications, deploy these applications, and more. Installed to /Applications/IceGrid Admin
